etymology.description: 中正 + 区(區) = district named Zhongzheng.
etymology.interpretation: Named after Chiang Kai-shek (Jiǎng Zhōngzhèng), it refers to the central administrative district of Taipei. Often associated with major government buildings and landmarks.
etymology.simplification: Only 區 was simplified to 区 to reduce strokes for ease of writing; Taiwan retains 區 while Mainland uses 区.

examples.chinese: 中正区位于台北市中心(中正區位於臺北市中心)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngzhèng Qū wèiyú Táiběi Shì zhōngxīn.
examples.english: Zhongzheng District is located in the center of Taipei City.

examples.chinese: 总统府与许多政府机关都在中正区(總統府與許多政府機關都在中正區)。
examples.pinyin: Zǒngtǒngfǔ yǔ xǔduō zhèngfǔ jīguān dōu zài Zhōngzhèng Qū.
examples.english: The Presidential Office and many government agencies are in Zhongzheng District.

examples.chinese: 这里有台北车站和中正纪念堂(這裡有臺北車站和中正紀念堂)。
examples.pinyin: Zhèlǐ yǒu Táiběi Chēzhàn hé Zhōngzhèng Jìniàntáng.
examples.english: It contains Taipei Main Station and the Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall.
